LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_01.title: Kurin orphelin
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_01.baseDescription: Les parents de [PAWN_nameDef], [PAWN_pronoun], se sont fait tuer par un humain lors de son enfance. Ce qui provoque le syndrome de stress post-traumatique.[PAWN_pronoun] à suivit un traitement psychiatrique de nombreuses année, ce qui lui a permit de reprendre une vie ordinaire mais souffre toujours de cauchemars.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_02.title: Kurin Jeune femme de chambre
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_02.baseDescription: Les parents de [PAWN_nameDef] on perdu toute leurs fortune et on croulé sous les dettes. La [PAWN_pronoun] s'est alors occupée du manoir familial.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_03.title: Kurin gardienne des renards
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_03.baseDescription: L'histoire de Fox Mugi Jagyedan était l'animation télévisée la plus populaire pour les jeunes Kurins. Cela a inspiré [PAWN_nameDef] à devenir une gardienne du village local. Cela n'exigeait cependant pas grand-chose de la part d'une [PAWN_pronoun] .
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_04.title: Kurin L'enfants de Killin
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_04.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] était une enfant aux yeux bleus inhabituels. Dans l'épopée des kurins, cela signifiait un mauvais présage, [PAWN_nameDef] a donc grandi en tant qu'enfant solitaire, évité par tous, des enfants aux adultes..
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_05.title: Kurin Jeune Kurin
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_05.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] était une terreur pour certain enfant et un sacré mal de tête pour les enseignants. Les comportements les plus fréquent des [PAWN_pronoun] était de ne pas respecter les horraires des corvées, ne pas écouter les enseignants et de mettre de la terre dans les chaussures des gens laissées au pieds des portes. Tout le monde était terrifié.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_06.title: Kurin Orphelin du guetto
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_06.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] a passé son enfance à chercher dans les poubelles les moindres restes de rations possible afin de pouvoir survivre. Il avait pourtant un centre d'aide pour les enfants, mais les conditions dans le quel il se trouvait était semblable à un batiment de bidonville et disposé que de peu d'aide humanitaire.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_07.title: Kurin Ball Catcher
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_07.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fanboy chasing his favirote team in the nation's sports league. After every game [PAWN_pronoun] he was caught on camera and gradually became the clubs mascot.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_08.title: Kurin Zoo Arbiter
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_08.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an older student. Because of their many sisters, their family was poor and so with helped small jobs at the zoo to earn tuition for themselves. [PAWN_pronoun] took care of relatively easy herbivores.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_09.title: Kurin Lazy Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_09.baseDescription: Studying bored [PAWN_nameDef], and they where often in trouble.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_10.title: Kurin Ordinary Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_10.baseDescription: Born in an ordinary middle-class family. [PAWN_nameDef] grew up with the warm love of their parents.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_11.title: Kurin Pro Gamer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_11.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a Pro Gamer and ranked in the top ten. [PAWN_pronoun] entered various competitions and won, but when the Internet was cut off, they became a lazy fox who did not want to do anything.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_12.title: Kurin Rural Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_12.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] they picked mushrooms in the mountains, chased cats in the fields, climed stones in the valleys, caught lobsters and fishes, roasted them, and spent their childhood with nature. Their skin was soaked in the sun, any they grew up healthy.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_13.title: Killin City Kid
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_13.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a city with excellent infrastructure, spacious parks and forests. [PAWN_pronoun] was located in the bustling city of Kuren, and was able to enjoy hobbies, cultural life, VR games and much more. nevertheless [PAWN_pronoun] favorite thing is to travel with there family.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_14.title: Kurin Artist
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_14.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was talent and liked to paint.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_15.title: Kurin's Tail Syndrome
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_15.baseDescription: Unlike others, [PAWN_nameDef] was born with only one tail, this caused their growth slowed. Because of this [PAWN_pronoun] seemed a lot younger than their peers and was often teassed, but others found [PAWN_pronoun] cute.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_16.title: Kurin Scared Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_16.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a very frightened child. Everywhere was filled with scary things. The shadows of the night, the small sounds that sound when you sleep. What they hated most was bugs, and would run away when ever they saw one.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_17.title: Kurin Affectionate Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_17.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]was a loving child. [PAWN_pronoun] always listened to their friends stories and help those who had a hard time.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_18.title: Kurin Poor Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_18.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had a poor life as a child. Parents of [PAWN_pronoun] would come back late at night from their seocnd jobs. [PAWN_pronoun] practially lived a little alone and grew up a little earlier than others. [PAWN_pronoun] hope for the future is a job that makes a lot of money and are willing to work hard to achieve thier dream.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_19.title: Kurin Teahouse Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_19.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] helped his parents after returning from school as a child. Received orders for guests and helping to clean. Regular guests would give [PAWN_nameDef] pocket money that [PAWN_pronoun] would use to buy ice cream.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_20.title: Kurin Tofu House Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_20.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] family has traditionally worked to make tofu going back for more than a hundred years.. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up learning his mother's teachings that tofu, which people love, should be made with the heart of Yubudo, Kurins favorite favorite.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_21.title: Kurin Nightlife Worker
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_21.baseDescription: It is illegal in the Kurin Republic for young children to work at night. But [PAWN_nameDef] was able to get a high income and lots of tips while doing invitations at the Kurins nightlife scene and errands at a convenience store.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_22.title: Kurin Young Craftsman
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_22.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had better dexterity than others. [PAWN_pronoun] liked to make cute crafts and give them to friends.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_23.title: A Young Gardener
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_23.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent most of their spare time planting and caring for flower beds and playing in a nearby botanical garden.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_24.title: Kurin Young Chef
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_24.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed baking bread and cookies as well as decorating cakes. They showed talent from simple meal to more comlex dishes.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_25.title: Kurin Animal Lover
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_25.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] really liked animals. [PAWN_pronoun] wanted to care for lots of animals but didnt have any pets. And so [PAWN_nameDef] would often go to the zoo.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_26.title: Kurin Smart Student
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_26.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] test scores were always at the top, and had good relationships with the other students. But spent a long time sitting at their desk and their body became weak and fragile, and it became routine to sit quietly in the corner when it was time for physical education.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_27.title: Kurin Versatile Child
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_27.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] would study, cook, craft and exercise. However [PAWN_nameDef] could not decide which path to take.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_28.title: Kurin Bookworm
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_28.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] liked to read books in his room with the reading lights on. Often [PAWN_pronoun] would spend the day reading old books at the old library.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_29.title: The First Kurin
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_29.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] Is one of the first Kurin.[PAWN_pronoun] was sleeping for hundreds of years without being able to wake up due to a flaw in the hibernation systems when the Kurins first arrived on the new planet. Only recently, did the Kurins complete the hibernation technique so that [PAWN_nameDef] could finally wake up.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_30.title: Kurin International Student
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_30.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has been away from their parents since they where a child to study a country of humans. Fortunately [PAWN_pronoun] the school they attended had good kids and teachers, and fortunately would grow into a lively and heartwarming fox.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_31.title: Kurin Young Artist
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_31.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a young fox who really liked music and singing with friends. They wrote songs and their own music, and would often have a good response from other Kurins.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_32.title: Kurin Actor
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_32.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] despite their young age, they where famous for there outstanding performance and rich emotional expression. [PAWN_nameDef] wanted to appear as a child actor in many movies and dramas, [PAWN_pronoun] where able to learn a variety of techniques and acting in various genres.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_33.title: Kurin Active Student
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_33.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always popular at school with friends because of there good sociability, cute looks and bright and cheerful personality. [PAWN_nameDef] had become enough of a celebrity to appear on a TV broadcasts, but was unable to play with friends or live freely as before, and became lonely. Not long after[PAWN_pronoun] decided to retire and return to normal life.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_34.title: Kurin Martial Arts Trainee
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_34.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was so sickly that they where much weaker than their peers. [PAWN_pronoun] began training with various exercises and combat techniques to overcome this. Through hard work [PAWN_pronoun] had improved enough to win the regional martial arts competition.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_35.title: Kurin Scout
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_35.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] parents in spite of their deprived state brought [PAWN_pronoun] a uniform for so they could join the local scout troupe and was able to spend many happy day learning various skills such as camping, cultivation and survival.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_36.title: Kurin Athlete
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryChild_36.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef], unlike most Kurins, liked sports and would go into the school gym to do various exercises. But unfortunately their academic record suffered.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_01.title: Kurin Newspaper Reporter
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_01.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had writen many articles in one of the many planatary newspapers that tells Kurin about the country's current affairs, culture and diplomacy.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_02.title: Kurin Maid
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_02.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a maid who was hired by a resident's mansion. From housework, cleaning and preparing meals, they also acted as a chamberlain to purchase necessary things for the mansion and to manage the books, and was greatly trusted by their master.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_03.title: Kurin Waitress
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_03.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a waitress at a restraunt, but learnt many tricks from the chef's brilliant cooking skills and knife skills.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_04.title: Kurin Prey
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_04.baseDescription: Fox hunting was an extravagant sport of human aristocrats that had long since disapered, but has been brought back in a fasion. [PAWN_nameDef] was in the role of a prey and wore a hair suit while trying escape the hunters. The shot used was a well-crushed salt shot, but [PAWN_pronoun] would often be bruised all over.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_05.title: Kurin Terrorist
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_05.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is was known as a terrorist but was actually a hero who assassinated an officer in a dictatorship who was killing Kurin for sport.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_06.title: Kurin Rabies Survivor
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_06.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was trapped in a city where a geneticaly enginered rabies virus had infected many Kurins, making them attack and infect one another. [PAWN_nameDef] hid in a convenience store for several days, hearing the screams as Kurin attaked each other in the streets before being resuced.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_07.title: Kurin Massage Shop Clerk
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_07.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a massage shop in the downtown area of their city. When Kurin came, they usually applied spices and oil and relieved fatigue with massage, but there was room for the Kurin who wanted something a little more.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_08.title: Kurin Natural Fox
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_08.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fox who went into the mountains because they did not want to live a tired city life. They built an old-fashioned house and lived alone with the soil and water in there hands.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_09.title: Kurin Citizen
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_09.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an ordinary citizen. Citizens who work hard every day and do various things are the foundation of Kurin society. They will face any hardship and adversity with pride and a strong Kurin identity.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_10.title: Kurin Bank Receptionist
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_10.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a good fox who worked at a bank. They would take care of various Kurins' deposits and give them financial advice.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_11.title: The Keeper of the Kurin Vineyards
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_11.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a watchman who wore a straw hat while sitting in a wooden cabin guarding the local vineyards. The cute young Kurin would often come to steal and eat the grapes.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_12.title: Kurin Airplane Pilot
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_12.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a pilot for a small plane. They got in trouble for smuggling people across a national border.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_13.title: Kurin Police
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_13.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an excellent police officer who graduated at the top of their class. However, the police did not match their personality and was often ridiculed.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_14.title: Kurin Ward Office Manager
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_14.baseDescription: They where in charge of recording the various weapons produced by a local company, they themself did not know how to make weapons.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_15.title: Missionary Kurin
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_15.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in service to their religious beliefs and was dedicated to helping poor Kurin. The would often organise events in order to raise donations.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_16.title: Orga Kurin Trading Company Temple Nise
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_16.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an employee of a trading company that exports various Kurin products to other countries. [PAWN_nameDef] was known to be a slow-moving but terrifying shopkeeper in other countries
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_17.title: Kurin Runway Signaler
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_17.baseDescription: [[PAWN_nameDef] is a fox who would signal aircraft at a Kurin Airport. Their earmuffs would often fall off and they woulod have to tie their tails together because of the aircrafts downdraft.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_18.title: Kurin Caravan Trader
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_18.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was originally an ordinary salesperson, but became a Caravan Trader due to the market crashing. Usually they visit only the same Kurin settlement, but sometimes visit other settlements to buy and sell necessary items.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_19.title: Kurin Convenience Store Clerk
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_19.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Kurin who had a part-time job at a convenience store in a residential area. They would study every night to fufil their dreams of becoming an architects.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_20.title: Kurin Tourist Resort Worker
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_20.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] would entertain kurin and humans alkie who came to the beach resort, and the income was quite good in the holiday season
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_21.title: Kurin Traditional Market Stall Owner
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_21.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] sold food at affordable prices in old Kurin markets.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_22.title: Kurin Former Chef
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_22.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a famous hotel chef in a human kingdom. However, after receiving complaints from customers who said that the food in the hotel had hair in it, they were fired. After returning to the Republic of Kurin they got a job in a small humble restaurant.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_23.title: Kurin Zoo Keeper
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_23.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in the local zoo. Mainly caring for young animals and training them to perform on stage. They also acted as a guide for visitors and was always popular.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_24.title: Kurin Hydroponic Farmer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_24.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has grown a variety of crops in hydroponic cultivators in fully-sterilized cultivation chambers and flesh chambers outside the city, and has also studied new seeds.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_25.title: Kurin Potter
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_25.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the few potters in the Republic of Kurin due to 3D printing technology. [PAWN_pronoun] created works that pursued beauty and value rather than practicality, their work was sold at a fairly high price.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_26.title: Kurin Hat Maker
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_26.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] made various silk hats. In a distant country of Kurin and other cultures, the hats where made traditionally became very popular with foxes.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_27.title: Kurin Watchmaker
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_27.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to make a watches. They where high-quality had become very popular with rich Kurin for there delicate and artistic appearance.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_28.title: Kurin Fish Dish Chef
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_28.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] cooked fish dishes were popular, and humans used to come from afar until the border was sealed.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_29.title: Kurin Costume Designer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_29.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] graduated from school to become costume designer. They wanted to make beautiful clothes, and so they began working as a apprentice in a studio, but dreamt of making clothes in their own studio.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_30.title: Kurin Tailor
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_30.baseDescription: The Kurins oldest city has many old and small shops. [PAWN_nameDef] was working as a tailor, as well as selling cloth and clothes to customers, they also made repairs.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_31.title: Kurin Production Line Worker
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_31.baseDescription: On the production line of the constantly running factory [PAWN_nameDef] assembled electronic parts on a frequent basis, and picked out defective products.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_32.title: Kurin Woodcutter
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_32.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had been working to produce wood from forests that have not yet been developed.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_33.title: urin Poor Robot Researcher
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_33.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has worked on several types of mechanoid. However the funding was cut off and they lived in poverty.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_34.title: Kurin Astronaut
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_34.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has several space flight experiences and has already performed an entire mission on another planet within the local star system.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_35.title: Kurin Maintenance Window Assistant
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_35.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] got a job as a mechanic in a private airline, they worked as an assistant doing miscellaneous work.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_36.title: Kurin Electrician
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_36.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had to climb high steel towers to replace the electric wires and parts. Their three tails helped balance them an their quick work helped them get a good income.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_37.title: Kurin Plumber
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_37.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] use to connect pipes in the snow fields and other Kurins homes.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_38.title: Kurin Heavy Industry Technician
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_38.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an engineer working at the largest shipbuilding facility in the Republic of Kurin, which also produces various cruise ships, container ships, destroyers and aircraft carriers. Heavy Industries was a giant company supplying more than 80% of the planets ships.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_39.title: Kurin Restaurant Waiter
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_39.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] they worked at a high-end restaurant, they took orders and delivered food to the tables. However they actually wanted to work in the kitchen, but could only cook a little bit.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_40.title: Kurin Nurse
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_40.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a formally trained nurse veteran. They worked in the emergency room with severely wounded Kurin.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_41.title: Kurin Astronomer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_41.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] analyzed the data sent by a deep space probe to create a three dimensional space map and calculated the interstellar flight path for the probe.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_42.title: Kurin Biotechnologist
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_42.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a biotechnologist who studied genetic engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] studied the genes of Kurin to find new ways to cure new diseases.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_43.title: Kurin Artificial Intelligence Engineer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_43.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was well aware of the danger of mechanoids and tried to develop new artificial intelligence humanoid robots. With frustrating repeated failures.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_44.title: Kurin Geologist
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_44.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a geologist who studies the huge faults, volcanoes and earth in foreign countries. They drilled the ground, sniffed it, smelled it on the floor and in the air, and devoted themselves to geological research.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_45.title: Kurin High School Teacher
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_45.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a teacher who taught mathematics in high school.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_46.title: Kurin Surgeon
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_46.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a surgeon working at a general hospital. There were not many patients in the city close to the border, but this changed when Kurins started to assaulted by humans.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_47.title: Kurin Health and Welfare Ministry Official
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_47.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a public official of the Kurin Medical and Health Department.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_48.title: Kurin Idol
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_48.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an emerging Kurin Idol. With great dancing skills, outstanding singing skills and beautiful looks.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_49.title: Kurin Rising Singer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_49.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was an acclaimed singer who released several albums as a singer-songwriter. [PAWN_pronoun] was invited to perform in various performances and appeared on TV broadcasts occasionally.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_50.title: Kurin Rising Singer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_50.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has appeared in many films and plays with there flexible voice and realistic acting skills.[PAWN_pronoun] has played many roles and has had lots of experience.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_51.title: Member of a Kurin Theater
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_51.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of a theatre that put on plays and songs with costumes decorated in various dazzling colors.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_52.title: Kurin Soldier
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_53.title: Kurin Marksman
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_54.title: Kurin Ranger
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_54.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was in charge of protecting the northern snow-covered forests and mountains. They where a ranger who manages the forest by taking the scent of the winds of the forest and the sound of the animals.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_55.title: Kurin Scout
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_55.baseDescription: After crashing off the perimeter, Kurin felt the need to scout other forces. [PAWN_nameDef] Was trained to secretly and quickly scout the enemy, and they where able to figure out the location, equipment and other information of the various other forces.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_56.title: Kurin Medical Officer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_56.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] became a medical officer to help injured soldiers on the battlefield. Although they realized that they sometimes had to kill an enemy to save their allies.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_57.title: Kurin Squad Leader
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_57.baseDescription: An experienced Soldier whos natural leadership capabilities led to them becoming a squad leader.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_58.title: Kurin Red Fox
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_58.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had trained in martial arts harder than anybody else when they saw the ruthless violence in a conflict with humans that had started following the Republic's departure. [PAWN_nameDef] participated in numerous battles, killing hundreds of humans with sharpshooting skills and quick judgment, their comrades called them the Red Fox.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_59.title: Kurin Fox Officer
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_59.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an officers of the fledgling Kurin army. Most of the work was tedious office work, but had plenty of time to read various books and do VR shooting training.
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_56.title: Kurin Descendant Bomber Pilot
LanguageData.DRNTF_BackstoryAdult_56.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a soldier who was mobilized in a war against humans.
